channel.title: Comments on: The Warcraft Auction House Database

item.title: By: jl
item.dc:creator: jl
item.description: Does it just not work anymore? I can't get any results back.
item.content:encoded: Does it just not work anymore? I can’t get any results back.

item.title: By: Sowplz
item.dc:creator: Sowplz
item.description: It looks like they're just dumping Auctioneer data into a database and puttin' a searchable front end on it. I suppose it'd be a cool resource to price check something when you're too lazy to scan the AH.
item.content:encoded: It looks like they’re just dumping Auctioneer data into a database and puttin’ a searchable front end on it. I suppose it’d be a cool resource to price check something when you’re too lazy to scan the AH.

item.title: By: Indy
item.dc:creator: Indy
item.description: It does have columns listing Average and Median, so i'm guessing that yes, it is doing some data mining for us. (Damn well better be, or those are mighty misleading column headings.)
item.content:encoded: It does have columns listing Average and Median, so i’m guessing that yes, it is doing some data mining for us. (Damn well better be, or those are mighty misleading column headings.)

item.title: By: tide
item.dc:creator: tide
item.description: When I was writing my mod and needed other players around to test it I used to always hang in the AH. I began to notice all the bots. "SwissBanker", "Bank", "MoneyHats" etc. I think there's been versions of this AH scraper for awhile. But the only use (the real intention) for it really is RMT.
item.content:encoded: When I was writing my mod and needed other players around to test it I used to always hang in the AH. I began to notice all the bots. “SwissBanker”, “Bank”, “MoneyHats” etc. I think there’s been versions of this AH scraper for awhile. But the only use (the real intention) for it really is RMT.
